00037 #define DEBUG_SUBSYSTEM S_RPC
00038 
00039 #include <obd.h>
00040 #include <obd_support.h>
00041 #include <obd_class.h>
00042 #include <lustre_lib.h>
00043 #include <lustre_ha.h>
00044 #include <lustre_net.h>
00045 #include <lprocfs_status.h>
00046 
00047 #define NIDS_MAX        32
00048 
00049 struct uuid_nid_data {
00050         struct list_head        un_list;
00051         struct obd_uuid         un_uuid;
00052         int                     un_nid_count;
00053         lnet_nid_t              un_nids[NIDS_MAX];
00054 };
00055 
00056 /* FIXME: This should probably become more elegant than a global linked list */
00057 static struct list_head g_uuid_list;
00058 static spinlock_t       g_uuid_lock;
00059 
00060 void class_init_uuidlist(void)
00061 {
00062         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&g_uuid_list);
00063         spin_lock_init(&g_uuid_lock);
00064 }
00065 
00066 void class_exit_uuidlist(void)
00067 {
00068         /* delete all */
00069         class_del_uuid(NULL);
00070 }
00071 
00072 int lustre_uuid_to_peer(const char *uuid, lnet_nid_t *peer_nid, int index)
00073 {
00074         struct uuid_nid_data *data;
00075         struct obd_uuid tmp;
00076         int rc = -ENOENT;
00077 
00078         obd_str2uuid(&tmp, uuid);
00079         spin_lock(&g_uuid_lock);
00080         list_for_each_entry(data, &g_uuid_list, un_list) {
00081                 if (obd_uuid_equals(&data->un_uuid, &tmp)) {
00082                         if (index >= data->un_nid_count)
00083                                 break;
00084 
00085                         rc = 0;
00086                         *peer_nid = data->un_nids[index];
00087                         break;
00088                 }
00089         }
00090         spin_unlock(&g_uuid_lock);
00091         return rc;
00092 }
00093 EXPORT_SYMBOL(lustre_uuid_to_peer);
00094 
00095 /* Add a nid to a niduuid.  Multiple nids can be added to a single uuid;
00096    LNET will choose the best one. */
00097 int class_add_uuid(const char *uuid, __u64 nid)
00098 {
00099         struct uuid_nid_data *data, *entry;
00100         int found = 0;
00101 
00102         LASSERT(nid != 0);  /* valid newconfig NID is never zero */
00103 
00104         if (strlen(uuid) > UUID_MAX - 1)
00105                 return -EOVERFLOW;
00106 
00107         OBD_ALLOC_PTR(data);
00108         if (data == NULL)
00109                 return -ENOMEM;
00110 
00111         obd_str2uuid(&data->un_uuid, uuid);
00112         data->un_nids[0] = nid;
00113         data->un_nid_count = 1;
00114 
00115         spin_lock(&g_uuid_lock);
00116         list_for_each_entry(entry, &g_uuid_list, un_list) {
00117                 if (obd_uuid_equals(&entry->un_uuid, &data->un_uuid)) {
00118                         int i;
00119 
00120                         found = 1;
00121                         for (i = 0; i < entry->un_nid_count; i++)
00122                                 if (nid == entry->un_nids[i])
00123                                         break;
00124 
00125                         if (i == entry->un_nid_count) {
00126                                 LASSERT(entry->un_nid_count < NIDS_MAX);
00127                                 entry->un_nids[entry->un_nid_count++] = nid;
00128                         }
00129                         break;
00130                 }
00131         }
00132         if (!found)
00133                 list_add(&data->un_list, &g_uuid_list);
00134         spin_unlock(&g_uuid_lock);
00135 
00136         if (found) {
00137                 CDEBUG(D_INFO, "found uuid %s %s cnt=%d\n", uuid,
00138                        libcfs_nid2str(nid), entry->un_nid_count);
00139                 OBD_FREE(data, sizeof(*data));
00140         } else {
00141                 CDEBUG(D_INFO, "add uuid %s %s\n", uuid, libcfs_nid2str(nid));
00142         }
00143         return 0;
00144 }
00145 
00146 /* Delete the nids for one uuid if specified, otherwise delete all */
00147 int class_del_uuid(const char *uuid)
00148 {
00149         struct uuid_nid_data *data;
00150         struct list_head deathrow;
00151 
00152         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&deathrow);
00153 
00154         spin_lock(&g_uuid_lock);
00155         if (uuid != NULL) {
00156                 struct obd_uuid tmp;
00157 
00158                 obd_str2uuid(&tmp, uuid);
00159                 list_for_each_entry(data, &g_uuid_list, un_list) {
00160                         if (obd_uuid_equals(&data->un_uuid, &tmp)) {
00161                                 list_move(&data->un_list, &deathrow);
00162                                 break;
00163                         }
00164                 }
00165         } else
00166                 list_splice_init(&g_uuid_list, &deathrow);
00167         spin_unlock(&g_uuid_lock);
00168 
00169         if (uuid != NULL && list_empty(&deathrow)) {
00170                 CDEBUG(D_INFO, "Try to delete a non-existent uuid %s\n", uuid);
00171                 return -EINVAL;
00172         }
00173 
00174         while (!list_empty(&deathrow)) {
00175                 data = list_entry(deathrow.next, struct uuid_nid_data,
00176                                   un_list);
00177                 list_del(&data->un_list);
00178 
00179                 CDEBUG(D_INFO, "del uuid %s %s/%d\n",
00180                        obd_uuid2str(&data->un_uuid),
00181                        libcfs_nid2str(data->un_nids[0]),
00182                        data->un_nid_count);
00183 
00184                 OBD_FREE(data, sizeof(*data));
00185         }
00186         return 0;
00187 }
00188 
00189 /* check if @nid exists in nid list of @uuid */
00190 int class_check_uuid(struct obd_uuid *uuid, __u64 nid)
00191 {
00192         struct uuid_nid_data *entry;
00193         int found = 0;
00194         ENTRY;
00195 
00196         CDEBUG(D_INFO, "check if uuid %s has %s.\n",
00197                obd_uuid2str(uuid), libcfs_nid2str(nid));
00198 
00199         spin_lock(&g_uuid_lock);
00200         list_for_each_entry(entry, &g_uuid_list, un_list) {
00201                 int i;
00202 
00203                 if (!obd_uuid_equals(&entry->un_uuid, uuid))
00204                         continue;
00205 
00206                 /* found the uuid, check if it has @nid */
00207                 for (i = 0; i < entry->un_nid_count; i++) {
00208                         if (entry->un_nids[i] == nid) {
00209                                 found = 1;
00210                                 break;
00211                         }
00212                 }
00213                 break;
00214         }
00215         spin_unlock(&g_uuid_lock);
00216         RETURN(found);
00217 }
00218 EXPORT_SYMBOL(class_check_uuid);
